  physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Dalada Maligawa or Temple of Buddha\u0027s Tooth in Kandy
 Sri Lanka. The photograph shows the front of the temple from the left. There is a brick patterned wall in front of the temple. A man is kneeling on the steps leading up to the entrance. The octagon of the temple is seen at the back
 with a man leading on one of the open doorways. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Dalada Maligawa or Temple of Buddha's Tooth in Kandy, Sri Lanka. The photograph shows the front of the temple from the left. There is a brick patterned wall in front of the temple. A man is kneeling on the steps leading up to the entrance. The octagon of the temple is seen at the back, with a man leading on one of the open doorways. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
